entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
